query:
MATCH (n: Person { name: "Luc" })-[e:KNOWS_WELL { name: "Whatever" }]->(m)-[e2]->(c:Person)
MATCH (a)-->(b)-->(c)
RETURN n, e, m LIMIT 3.5

expect.plan:
ANALYZE ERROR
-------* Query error
     2 | MATCH (a)-->(b)-->(c)
     3 | RETURN n, e, m LIMIT 3.5
       |                ^^^^^^^^^
-------* LIMIT expression must be an integer
